channel.title: Creating a highscores list for private servers :S?
channel.description:
How can this be done?
GUIs, php, blah?
I have no clue what I'm talking about so can any one send me atleast in the correct directions please?
OR if you're really kind and generous and are giving me the codes would be nice :D I might even repay you some how, RS2 cash MAYBE :D?
:mad: :( now I know I suck at this... highscores is basic stuff right :S?
(I thought about posting this in the java programing, but than I guess its more related to private servers)

item.description:
@quest_rs wrote:

oh, thanks anyways :D. I tried Runescape… guess I wasnt looking close enough :S.

Thanks again lawl <3

or pm me?
